item.description:
Hi all,

Week 2 is already on the way, Buffalo are coming the Lambeau Field to take on the Packers, the "Packers Boston" will be meeting on the 2nd floor of the Banshee @ 1.00pm next Sunday. Thank you again to the 30 or so who turned out for the Phili game, lets keep it going. Radeberger will have some giv-a-ways this Sunday also, as always any comments or any feed back welcome.

follow us;
facebook, bansheebarboston
twitter, bansheeboston

Packers Boston

group.name: The Boston Green Bay Packers Meetup Group

item.name: Buffalo @ Lambeau Field
